attributes.action: Ban smoking entirely unless it is in the inviduals own home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smoking should be banned in all public places and only be allowed within a persons own home. Whilst this may receive opposition it is in the interests of EVERYONE including smokers in the long run. Please help us get smoking banned and sign the petition!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
